bibl.title: Paul CARTLEDGE, Peter GARNSEY and Erich GRUEN (Edd.), Hellenistic Constructs. Essays in Culture, History, and Historiography
bibl.note: Critique de: Édouard WILL, Pour une "anthropologie coloniale" du monde hellénistique, The Craft of the Ancient Historian. Essays in Honor of Chester G. Starr (Lanham - New York - London, 1985) pp. 273-301. - I. Models of Interaction. - II. Critical Differences. - III. Two Case Studies. - IV. Applying Will's Approach. - V. Looking for Value.
BAGNALL Roger S., Decolonizing Ptolemaic Egypt.

Paul CARTLEDGE, Peter GARNSEY and Erich GRUEN (Edd.), Hellenistic Constructs. Essays in Culture, History, and Historiography = Hellenistic Culture and Society. 26 (Berkeley - Los Angeles - London, 1997) pp. 225-241.
